text: Giuseppe Chiaravalloti (26 February 1934 â€“ 6 January 2025) was an Italian judge and politician. He was the President of Calabria between 18 May 2000 to 2 May 2005. He was a member of the Forza Italia. Chiaravalloti was born in Satriano, Italy. Chiaravalloti died on 6 January 2025 in Catanzaro, Italy at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Presidents of Calabria
title: Giuseppe Chiaravalloti
